channel.title: General mod talk
channel.description: Talk about any of the team's mods in here, ask about them too.

item.title: SP Framework feedback thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (Parser)
item.dc:creator: Parser
item.content:encoded:
In this thread feel free to post questions, queries or help requests regarding the Single Player Framework. Because this thread is linked to from the readme, I'll also post any advanced tutorials or explanations here too.

FAQ
----
Q. How come in some maps I have the inventory display in the top right whereas in others I don't?

A. The inventory system is optional. The mapper can specify whether or not to use the inventory system through the SPLevelInfo actor - specifically the...

SP Framework feedback thread

item.title: I have problems hosting a FHI game
item.author: invalid@example.com (tgranholm)
item.dc:creator: tgranholm
item.content:encoded:
I installed the mod to UT2004\FHIMod like it was supposed to and removed the old one with the .bat file. I also patched the game.
Instant Action game mode works without problems, but when I try to host a game after I've selected a map and mutators and other stuff, and after I click Listen the game starts to load (goes to the loading screen) then closes and a new window opens saying:

Critical Error

UT2004 Build UT2004_Patch_[2004-05-10_17.18]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU:...

I have problems hosting a FHI game

item.title: Satore Monster pack
item.author: invalid@example.com (papaschtroumpf)
item.dc:creator: papaschtroumpf
item.content:encoded:
I keep hearing of the Satore Monster Pack for (retail) Invasion. Is this something that would be compatible with FHI and add variety to the monsters?
Has anyone tried it? How does it affect the gameplay.
I'm also concerned about having too many add-ons on the server that might scare people off, but I'd be willing to give it a try if I can setup a re-direct so it doesn't get downloaded directly from my server.

If anyone has any experience with mixing the Satore Monster pack with FHI I'd...

Satore Monster pack

item.title: How to bind keys
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zeon0909)
item.dc:creator: Zeon0909
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,

Thanks for your help with the chainsaw, managed to figure it out.

Now, im further in on my mod now and im making a reload for one of the other weapons, I have the code I need, I just need to bind it to one of the keys, preferably the letter 'L'. Does anyone know how to do this? I've trawled google and cant find anything to help

Thanks

item.title: Chainsaw melee weapon
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zeon0909)
item.dc:creator: Zeon0909
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,

Im new to uScript and one of my friends has set me a challenge to make a chainsaw mod for UT3. Now, being new i havent the slightest idea what im doing, but the Liandri Hacker v2 seems to have all the functionality that i need.

Would it be possible for you to let me see the source code for it please?

Many thanks,

Connor

item.title: A few quick questions.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ZotSindi)
item.dc:creator: ZotSindi
item.content:encoded:
Whatever happened to the Ghost monster?

Since v5 it seems to have disappeared, I used to love filling waves with nothing but Ghosts on a map like FHI-MazeMedium and trying to survive the onslaught of creepy invisible flying assailants.


Also "Life After Death" has some issues, occasionally it will spawn a "Boss Zombie" that is completely invincible and cannot die, as the match goes on this one monster will slowly beat down everyone in the map.

How can I make them stop spawning altogether...

A few quick questions.

item.title: FHIv4 and Monster Manager 1.8...
item.author: invalid@example.com (bobmc)
item.dc:creator: bobmc
item.content:encoded:
I've been trying to get Monster manager to work with FHIv4 and Monster Manager doesn't seem to be able to work correctly.

I've installed MM in the FHIv4/system Dir and added it to the FHIv4.ini and it shows up in the mutator list and activates but the options to configure your monsters thats supposed to show up in the "default" section of the web admin doesn't show for some reason. I've checked the UCC.log and it shows MM being loaded OK and there are no error messages to indicate...

FHIv4 and Monster Manager 1.8...

item.title: Play on classic UT2004 maps ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rhlph)
item.dc:creator: Rhlph
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I downloaded this mod because I love the Invasion mode, but I needed new monsters.
So, I tried it, and... wow. Great work.

But I would like to know if it is possible to play FHI on DM maps, by simply replacing the default monsters with FHI ones ?
Thanks in advance...

item.title: No monster movement in FHIv5
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jastley)
item.dc:creator: Jastley
item.content:encoded:
I have the FHIv5 conversion and everything works except the monsters never move. They attack when you get within range of what ever they do, be it missiles or melee but they never walk around or move. They spawn and are able to be killed but nothing else

Any ideas? Thank you very much!

item.title: BT 2004 Project
item.author: invalid@example.com (Solution)
item.dc:creator: Solution
item.content:encoded:
Hello, im here asking help for the Bt 2004 Project.
Wat is BT ? ( Bunny track ) a mod from unreal tournament 99 , atm we are mapping and we need somone to convert us a mutator from ut99 for ut2004.
Thx.

item.title: Help in the name of SCIENCE!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dr Zeus)
item.dc:creator: Dr Zeus
item.content:encoded:
Hello - my name is Zeus Simeoni, I'm a researcher in the Comm. Sci. Department at the University of Connecticut. I'm currently studying video game enjoyment and violence, and I could use some help or sage advice.

I am in dire need of a UT2004 mutator, but needless to say, since this game is so dated, even basic documentation on how to construct a mutator, or which mutators are available (or what they do) seems nearly impossible to find. I'm a gamer geek myself, but I've just never...

Help in the name of SCIENCE!

item.title: Am after some monsters....
item.author: invalid@example.com (UT2k4-Player)
item.dc:creator: UT2k4-Player
item.content:encoded:
Hope to have some questions answered about FHI and as I am not sure where to ask 'em, I'll start right here:

The monsters in the FHIv4 pack:

Hell-raiser (Robot that uses Howitzer)
Controller (Giant size Spider-mine monster)
Nepolia (Another big Spider)

Is it possible to get these monsters in FHI packs separate to the whole mod.

You see I am toying with the idea of setting up a server and wanted an easier way to include those monsters whilst keeping all files for the server...

Am after some monsters....

item.title: Help with missing FHI files
item.author: invalid@example.com (fight-club)
item.dc:creator: fight-club
item.content:encoded:
Hi all.

I run a 10 slot invasion server and I did add FHI weapons on it. It works great, but server log shows two missing razor related files.
I used FHI 3.1 and these are the two warnings I get:
______________
Warning: Missing SkeletalMesh SkeletalMesh FHIAnim.RazorBomb
Warning: Missing StaticMesh StaticMesh FHIsmeshes.Weapons.razorbombworld
____________________

I dont have razor bomb in use on the server so it runs without problems, but I would like to find these two files and...

Help with missing FHI files

item.title: FHI server not working
item.author: invalid@example.com (sittinonmybumm@mchsi.)
item.dc:creator: sittinonmybumm@mchsi.
item.content:encoded:
To put it simply, I can make a ut2004 invasion server which WILL show up on the internet servers. However when i make an FHI server, it doesnt show up under "invasion" nor "FHI Invasion" when i search for it on the internet. Both servers do, however, show up under the LAN tab.

I would like to be able to use the FHI mod so that anyone who wants to play regular invasion can join the server. I want the FHI mod due to the improved monsters/weapons/maps etc.

item.content:encoded: So I have been trying to download your files but they are all zip files & i can't figure out how to get the files on my ps3 please help & the 1 i want the most is the ripper or hacker

item.title: Hacker v2 feedback and such!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Arcodus)
item.dc:creator: Arcodus
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
I am currently using the new hacker as my melee weapon in UT3. It's really nice, so much more fun to use than the impact hammer! It's very cool that you can use it to launch yourself into the air and hop great distances, just watch your back! It's nice that you can trip opponents over and then you cut them up as they try to stand up, Grizzly! And sparks fly when you use it on a wall, cool. I had expected another sound when you use the weapon, though it does sound brutal. I award the...

Hacker v2 feedback and such!
